readable.title: 2180356743_b3a3c9a7f6
readable.content: A boy standing and watching a group of people on a basketball court . A boy standing in the foreground looking out over other people in a court . A boy stands overlooking a schoolyard where other children play . A boy watches his classmates play in a courtyard , looking from above . A little boy is standing above a structure and watching the other boys play a game .
